rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. The number at the top-left corner of each cage is the product of digits inside the cage. Digits do not repeat within a cage.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. The number at the top-left corner of each cage is the product of digits inside the cage. Digits do not repeat within a cage.
